Articles.Content:
I recently got the HL Airships mod, and it comes with the Toolbar Plugin. Since then, It will not let me revert flight!! I deleted the TB Plugin and it worked fine, except that I can not control buoyancy in the airships. How do I get the TB plugin to work and let me revert flight!

Please Help!!

I recently got the HL Airships mod, and it comes with the Toolbar Plugin. Since then, It will not let me revert flight!! I deleted the TB Plugin and it worked fine, except that I can not control buoyancy in the airships. How do I get the TB plugin to work and let me revert flight!

Please Help!!

This is probably better posted in the release thread for the specific mod in question, as you've identified the problem as not being a problem with KSP itself.
